Annotations.Summary: System saturated, load per core is very high.
Annotations.Description:
System load per core at ip-10-0-15-225.ap-southeast-1.compute.internal has been above 2 for the last 15 minutes, is currently at 2.37.
This might indicate this instance resources saturation and can cause it becoming unresponsive.
